mapper.sql: contract, name, totalsupply, symbol, description, contactinfo, createtime, auditflag, updatetime, logo
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_ont_oep5 (contract, name, totalsupply, symbol, description, contactinfo, createtime, auditflag, updatetime, logo) values (#{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalsupply,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tbl_ont_oep5
contract,
name,
totalsupply,
symbol,
description,
contactinfo,
createtime,
auditflag,
updatetime,
logo,

mapper.update:
update tbl_ont_oep5
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalsupply = #{totalsupply,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contactinfo = #{contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
auditflag = #{auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where contract = #{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_ont_oep5 set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalsupply = #{totalsupply,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactinfo = #{contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auditflag = #{auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where contract = #{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}c
mapper.select: select a.contract as ContractHash, b.Name, a.TotalSupply, a.Symbol, b.Description, b.ContactInfo, b.CreateTime, b.UpdateTime, b.Logo, b.ABI, b.Code, b.TxCount, b.Creator, b.Addresscount, b.OntCount, b.OngCount from tbl_ont_oep5 a, tbl_ont_contracts b where a.Contract = b.contract order by Createtime asc limit #{Start}, #{PageSize}
select count(*) from tbl_ont_oep5 a,tbl_ont_contracts b where a.contract = b.contract
select Contract, name as Symbol from tbl_ont_oep5 where auditflag = 1
